title: is urf (gamemode) coming back this snowdown
body: since you can make customs of the current rotating gamemode, is urf on sr/ha gonna return this snowdown? i wanna do urf 1v1s again

replies.body: URF won't come back, especially not in snowdown, since it's already in Nexus Blitz, the reason is Riot lost players and therefore money every time URF was up, as fun as the gamemode is, most people don't actually like it
doubt it will return for a while.
